args: Here you areâ€”a single marshmallow.\nNow be good friends and share it\nbetween the two of you, all right?
Whoa, ANOTHER one?\nHalloween is the beeeeest!
Who should we go to next? ...Oh!
Making a candy house in the garden, eh?\nHow very refined, {player_name}.
It's dangerous to only give a pirate those\ntwo options. You two must be brave as\nthe sea itself, by gar!
So then! What sort of trick are you\nplanning to pull on me if I don't make\nwith the treat booty?
Er, we didn't really plan that far ahead.
Pfft. What a waste! Halloween is the one\ntime of year when you can prank people\nbut good. You need to plan an epic trick!
Yeah, I guess you're right... All right, then!\nWe're gonna trick fools like they've never\nbeen tricked before!
Er, but what kind of trick should we DO?\nI can't think of any good ones.
*sigh* You two are hopeless. But fine!\nI'll give you some pointers so you can\nenjoy both the ï¼‚tricksï¼‚ and the ï¼‚treats.ï¼‚
Right then! We're going to form a gang\nthat does nothing but celebrate Halloween.\nAnd we'll be called...the Plunder Pals!
From this point forth, you will refer to me\nas ï¼‚Captain.ï¼‚ Now weigh anchor, lassies!
...Why on earth would they put an assassin\nin charge of making dinner?
This pie's done. How's the soup coming\nalong?
Almost finished. I just need to add my\nsecret ingredient to spice it up...
Gahar har har! Trick or treat, mateys!\nIt be usâ€”the Plunder Pals!
Are you implying that these adorable\nchildren are freebooters of some manner?

That's right! We're a band of merry pirates
who appear but once a year on Halloween.
...And we'll start by plundering that pie.
Yoink! *munch* *crunch* *slobber*
*munch* *smack* Oh wow, that was good.\nNow you two! Grab a slice and chow down!
Er, is it really okay for us to do that?\nWe haven't eaten our vegetables yet.
Who cares? This is our Halloween trick!
Weeeeell, in THAT case... *horf* *chomp*\nOh man, pumpkin pie whaaaaat?!
*sluuuuurp* Mmm! This pumpkin soup\nis warming me all up!
Oh yeah? Heh. That's good to heaâ€”HEY!\nSTOP STEALING OUR FOOD!
I'm serious, now! Stop stealing food or\nwe won't have anything left for dinner.
Gahar har har! You won't get rid of us that\neasily! Now give us a treat, or the tricks\nwill continue unabated!
Wait. You play a trick first, THEN demand\ntreats? ...Is that really how this works?
Er, will this pie be enough? I originally\nmade it for Fydon and Felyx, but humans\ncan eat it as well.
It is an adult's duty to look the other way\nwhen it comes to children's pranksâ€”\nparticularly so on Halloween.
One of them is a hell of a big kid...\nBut eh, fine. Give me a second to\nwhip up some baked goodies here.
See how it works, you two? You prank\nright out of the gate, then blackmail 'em\nto get the sweet, sweet booty.
Hmm. Perhaps we can both forget this\ngame ever happened.
Trick or treeeat! The Plunder Pals\nhave arrived!
Well, look at these excitable young lasses.\nWhat can we do for you?
It's time for a Halloween trick, old man!\nShow 'em what ya got, Maribelle.
Aye-aye, captain! Um, so, I guess...\nI'll move THESE!
Yep! And if you don't give us treats,\nI'm gonna move 'em even MORE!
Heh. Well, we certainly can't have that.\nHere thenâ€”take these steamed buns.
Hey, what gives? We're tricking the heck\nout of you, but you sound all impressed.
Don't be an old fuddy-duddy, Raemond.\nGive the children a treat.
Fuddy-duddy? How dare you, sir!\n...Fine then. If I give you something,\nwill you stop interfering with our game?
All right, time to make for our next target.\nSteady on, lassies!
...Um, Notte? When you're bobbing in front\nof me like that, I can't see the crystal.
Ugh. Just move, already! The crystal\nball is showing us how to get the\nprince to a wedding hall!
Trick or treeeat! ...Oh, and I'm not leaving\ntill you give us treats, if you're confused\nabout how this works.
Oh, are you SERIOUS?! Okay, fineâ€”\ntake these cookies and get out of my\nface already.
Er, I have some sugar plums.\nWill those do?
You two are really getting the hang of this.\nSo next we haveâ€”

You know what it is! Just because it's
Halloween does NOT mean you can run
amok playing tricks and making a mockery
of common decency. It's inexcusable!
As a preacher, it is my duty to correct you\nwith the Loving Hand!
Nooooo! I don't want a Loving Haaaand!\nWhat are we gonna do, Captain?!
Hold your ground, lassies! In times like\nthese, you just have to... Whoa.
Is that...{player_name}?!\nIn a Halloween costume?!\nHe's soooo handsome!
Karina, there's no way I'm going to be\ndistracted by such an obvious ploy.\nGive me SOME credit here.
...Still, what if she's serious and I miss it?\nMaybe I can just... *peek*
NOW! Plunder Pals, full speed ahead!
And so, the Plunder Pals sailed from one end of\nthe castle to the other, plundering treats and\nengaging in every manner of trick imaginable.
Mmm! These treats are delish...\nThis is a haul fit for a queen!
Treats that you get after tricking people\njust taste better for some reason.
I think I could get used to this life.\nThat's probably a bad thing, huh?
A little excess once in a while is fine.\nYou live but a single time, after all.
This was super fun, Captain Karina.\nThanks for helping us!
I should be thanking the two of you!\nI had a really good time.
But alas, this is where the Plunder Pals\nmust disband. However, I have one last\nthing I'd like to say to you...
When times look rough, get greedy!\nThat's how you live a life without\nregrets. Got it?
